long kalloc ( const register unsigned long  length,
const register unsigned int  process,
const register unsigned long  flags 
)

Allocates a memory block.

Returns:
an address to the memory block or an error code if the allocation was not successful.
Parameters:
length  The number of bytes to allocate.
process  The process for which memory is to be allocated.
flags  Flags indicating the type of memory block to allocate.

void update_memory_protection ( const register unsigned long  page_table,
const register unsigned long  start_address,
const register unsigned long  length,
const register unsigned long  flags 
)

Change the protection of a range of pages in a page table.

To be implemented in task A4.

Parameters:
page_table  Address of the page table to update.
start_address  Address to the first page to update.
length  Total number of bytes to update.
flags  A set of flags showing the protection to use on the pages.
